help.name: mris_remesh
help.description: Remeshes a surface to a desired edge length or number of vertices or average face area. Either --edge-len or --nvert or --desired-face-area must be specified on the commandline.

required-flagged.explanation: target average edge length in mm for remeshed surface
target number of vertices for remeshed surface
Control the decimation by specifying the desired average face area in mm2
